channel.title: Comments for page "Letter of Marque"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Letter of Marque"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
waht most players dont recognize is, that if you obtain the letter you not only keep your normal NWW bonusses, but you also gain +1 range - a bonus your normal NWW Items dont give.
so it is cheaper than the Chakra armor that also gives +1range.
And furthermore, when looping you obtain the Theme Warstruck, that gives double NWW Points when activated. - A really useful item, this letter ;)
